title: RADS Error
body:
All it says is
"Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information."
I dont even know were to find the logs.
This morning i could log on just fine. I also tried reinstalling and it didnt work.

replies.body: What percent are you experiencing the unspecified error?  That will help determine what's happening exactly.  Let me know!
I'm having this issue and it appears to be at 33%.

At that point of the process, the patcher needs to download updates but something is blocking it.  You'll want to go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your network can connect specifically to the patching servers.  That should get the issue fixed!
I went quickly through that, and installed the Hextech Repair Tool. Would the logs help?

If you're having connection issues and the guide didn't help, then you'll want to submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  The logs would benefit our tech team more than it would here on the boards, so you can attach it in your ticket.
